title: Second Language Acquisition Simulation Course Based on 3D Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Immersive virtual scenarios for solving mathematical problems in a second language, aiming to integrate language acquisition with disciplinary competencies

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% communication accuracy in the target language while performing mathematical problem-solving tasks in a 3D virtual environment.
Learners generate academic second-language expressions with at least 90% accuracy through in-game situational dialogue simulations (10 types).
Learners improve their second-language feedback processing ability (listening-response) in real-time interactions with peers by at least 75% through collaborative missions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
